author: costin
msg: - Response and BufferedServletOutputStream use ResponseAdapter ( in all
methods that used to be abstract, you can still override them with non-Response
- replaced ServerResponse with HttpResponseAdapter, ServerResponse is still
there ( as an empty extension of Response) for old code.
Looking forward for feedback on the new Adapter model. Next week I'll move
all apache adapters to use only the 3 Adapter interfaces.
Also, the embeded server ( tomcat.server ) will use the same code for TCP
handling ( tomcat.service instead of the EndpointManager/Endpoint).
